name: Marnie Salerno
text: Food tastes AMAZING, The Salad tastes Great, and the Pizza is Phenomenal.

name: Liz Nolan
text: We tried the pizza and cheesy bread for the first time today. They are both absolutely fantastic. I'm very pleasantly surprised this will be my go to place in the future. The staff are very pleasant and obliging as well  Finally a great pizza place in the area that wont break the wallet

name: Jack Touma
text: This place is great specially when you call to order and they know who you are and what you like and the food is always ready in time and tastes great and the employees are so friendly and they welcome you with a smile . ‚Ä¶More

name: Christine Lanken
text: Love their regular crust with all 3 seasonings! Cheesy bread is really good, but almost too much bread with pizza. Salads are fresh and large is more than enough for 2.

name: Joshua Guenther
text: Pizza tastes great and at reasonable prices with the many specials they have. Good pizza and being a couple minutes from my house are a very dangerous combination... Also, it doesn't happen often but my order has been messed up from time to time. Again, doesn't happen often but it's happened enough to warrant mentioning.

name: Hannah K
text: The people here are very nice. The girl here helped me find a coupon so I could afford a lunch. The pizza was good too but nothing beats good customer service and nice people.

name: Daniel Czempinski
text: Purchased a hot sub. It was delicious. I will be back if I'm ever in the area again.

name: Keith Bloom
text: Freshest tasting salad I've had in a long time.. onions..green peppers...olives....cheese...salad...krisp and refreshing..!!

name: Josh Flaim
text: Have their pizza and bread sticks for the first time today.  Awesome.  A lot better pizza then some of the other options we have on the east side of the river.

name: B.O.C. CHUBB
text: Low key very good quality, way better than domino's and cheaperüçΩ

name: Scott Lebo
text: Excellent food. And staff is more than friendly. Keep up the good work

name: Aleksandra Stevens
text: I get coupons sent to my house and I use them when Im at work. I sent an employee to pick up my free pizza and $10.00 salad I ordered today and the manager gave her attitude about the free pizza and coupon. If your going to send out the ‚Ä¶More

name: Shimmid Klofster
text: Best place for delicious and affordable pizza. I tried some of their cinna square bites. Omg! Heavenly! They have subs and salads too, but the pizza is absolutely killer. This restaurant is where I will be ordering my pizza from now on. ‚Ä¶More

name: Rob Rodz
text: Good pizza but I hope they can do a newctupe of Cheese bread , like the one at Dominos.

name: Claudette Valencia
text: Good pizza place. Only downfall is they don't sell pizza by the slice.

name: Akli Kechir
text: Marco s pizza is my best.i like it.

name: Kenny Tee
text: Don't get me wrong, this place has some amazing food. Ordered a pizza for the 2nd time this week and when the delivery kid got to my house I noticed that he was quite rude. Asked him how his night was n he just mumbled how are you. Then ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Hayes
text: I'm happy a Marcos came to Algonquin.  Easier to get this great pizza!

name: Tiffany Acker
text: so didn't do thanksgiving this year no family so found this place open I take care of my 83 year old grandmother and we had to eat js and i was amazed the pizza was amazing and we got boneless chicken dippers I was completely impressed with this place

name: Deborah Harris
text: Awesome BBQ flatbread pizza, great cheesy bread and fresh salads.  Awesome addition to Algonquin!

name: Ihab Khoury
text: Large variety of food,  Greek touch,  sandwiches are great especially the Italian sub.

name: Dan Bell
text: Food is great but their website is awful and horrible to use.

name: Francy Headrick
text: Love those dippers and the meatball bake.

name: Stephen Swibes
text: Great food, Great Service!

name: Scott Schmeiser
text: Great pizza for a good price.   Not much room for lunch and only bother drinks.

name: Angelika Walker
text: Great stuff , great food -- great place! :)

name: Rebecca Christine
text: So good so good so good!!

name: ewa turczynska
text:
Hope I  could give 0 star,
Disgusting sandwiches,  not worth at all ,
first time order and never again !

name: Anthony Kovari
text: Order the pizza with butter crust

name: Pam
text: Great pizza
